mapper.select: SELECT rn,REPLY_SEQ ,USER_ID ,STORE_SEQ ,REPLY_CONTENT ,REPLY_CLEAN ,REPLY_PRICE ,REPLY_SERVICE ,REPLY_ANSWER ,REPLY_READ ,REPLY_REGDATE ,REPLY_DELFLAG FROM (SELECT rownum AS rn, REPLY_SEQ ,USER_ID ,STORE_SEQ ,REPLY_CONTENT ,REPLY_CLEAN ,REPLY_PRICE ,REPLY_SERVICE ,REPLY_ANSWER ,REPLY_READ ,REPLY_REGDATE ,REPLY_DELFLAG FROM CON_REPLY) WHERE CEIL(rn/5)=#{pnum} AND USER_ID =#{user_id}
SELECT * FROM CON_REPLY WHERE STORE_SEQ=${store_seq} ORDER BY REPLY_REGDATE
